column1: We would like to thank Charles T. Roman and Mary-Jane James-Pirri for the development of the
salt marsh monitoring protocols and Dennis Skidds for his work on the salt marsh monitoring
database and data management support. We would also like to thank the 2010 field crew
members, Robin Baranowski, Zachary Bourassa, Daphne Forster, Brandon Haynes, and Casey
Nolan, for their hard work and, of course, the George Washington National Monument staff for
providing support to the NCBN field crew.
